message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $60. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I'm still a bit above my budget, can you think about going down to $80? I really like the product, but I'm trying to stay within my means.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $90, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Let me think about it...
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm really trying to stick to my budget. Can you meet me at $85? That's the lowest I can go.
I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $92.50, but I think that's as low as I can go. Let me know if that works for you.
